name: AASHNA FOUNDATION
briefDescription: Ashana foundation was started on 25-04-2011 by Zaheer Ahmed M Khajapur And Nikhil R Gupta as a Non-Profit organisation. The idea was to create awareness in the society on education and to help the underprivileged at the best of our abilities. In the last year we worked in the education field which was appreciated by the teachers and parents. We have conducted a program on ill effects of Tobacco and also Organized an educational program named "How to improve memory and study skills" in hubli taluk in almost fifty schools. This initiate increased the performance of students in their studies.
